page.title: 07ST. GEORGES POST OFFICE
page.content:
The post office is in a semi-detached building built as a shop 80 years ago. The post office opened inside the shop 50 years ago. It sells stamps, postal orders, saving certificates, premium bonds, air mail letters and registered envelopes. In the post office they have 2 weighing scales, one for letters up to 2kg and one for parcels up to 10kg. There is a burglar alarm and a safe to keep the money in over-night.
In the same room the shop sells groceries, meat, cards and sweets. They have an old fan scale and a digital scale which is rectangular with a flat pan. It uses electronic numbers to show the weight and cost of goods. The old fashioned fan scale is tall with a long needle to show the weight and price.
